Reference

College Football Data API Key

Functions for using your API key.

cfbd_key() has_cfbd_key()

CFBD API Key Registration

Play-by-Play Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR which return Expected Points and Win Probability model outputs.

cfbd_pbp_data()

CFBD Play by Play Data

Full Seasons PBP Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR which load full seasons of cfbfastR data

load_cfb_pbp()

Load cfbfastR play-by-play

Update or Create Database

Functions exported by cfbfastR which update and create a database of cfbfastR play-by-play data

update_cfb_db()

Update or Create a cfbfastR Play-by-Play Database update_cfb_db updates or creates a database with cfbfastR play by play data of all completed games since 2014.

Games Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from games endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_game_info() cfbd_calendar() cfbd_game_media() cfbd_game_box_advanced() cfbd_game_player_stats() cfbd_game_records() cfbd_game_team_stats()

CFBD Games Endpoint

Drives Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from drives endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_drives()

Get results information from games

Plays Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from plays endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_plays() cfbd_play_stats_player() cfbd_play_stats_types() cfbd_play_types()

CFBD Plays Endpoint

Teams Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the teams endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_team_info() cfbd_team_matchup_records() cfbd_team_matchup() cfbd_team_roster() cfbd_team_talent()

CFBD Teams Endpoint

Players Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the teams endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_player_info() cfbd_player_returning() cfbd_player_usage()

CFBD Players Endpoint

Stats Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the conferences endpoint of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_stats_categories() cfbd_stats_game_advanced() cfbd_stats_season_advanced() cfbd_stats_season_player() cfbd_stats_season_team()

CFBD Stats Endpoint

Rankings and Ratings Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the rankings and ratings endpoints of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_rankings() cfbd_ratings_sp() cfbd_ratings_sp_conference() cfbd_ratings_srs()

CFBD Ratings and Rankings Endpoints

espn_ratings_fpi()

ESPN Ratings

Metrics Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the Predicted Points Added (PPA) endpoints of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_metrics_ppa_games() cfbd_metrics_ppa_games() cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_games() cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_season() cfbd_metrics_ppa_predicted() cfbd_metrics_ppa_teams() cfbd_metrics_wp_pregame() cfbd_metrics_wp()

CFBD Metrics Endpoint

espn_metrics_wp()

ESPN Metrics

Recruiting Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from the rankings and ratings endpoints of the CollegeFootballData API

cfbd_recruiting_player() cfbd_recruiting_position() cfbd_recruiting_team()

CFBD Recruiting Endpoint

Schools Data

Functions exported by cfbfastR sourced from venues, conferences, and coaches endpoints of the CollegeFootballData API

CFB Venue Information

cfbd_conferences()

CFB Conference Information

cfbd_coaches()

check_github()

Check latest GitHub version of R package

cfbd_play_type_df cfbd_conf_types_df

CFBD Data

espn_metrics_wp()

ESPN Metrics

espn_ratings_fpi()

ESPN Ratings

get_fun_from_pkg()

load function from package

load_cfb_pbp()

Load cfbfastR play-by-play

cfbd_key() has_cfbd_key()

CFBD API Key Registration

update_cfb_db()

Update or Create a cfbfastR Play-by-Play Database update_cfb_db updates or creates a database with cfbfastR play by play data of all completed games since 2014.

create_epa()

Create EPA Adds Expected Points calculations to Play-by-Play data.frame

epa_fg_probs()

Performs Field Goal adjustments for Expected Points model calculations

create_wpa_naive()

Add Win Probability Added (WPA) calculations to Play-by-Play DataFrame This is only for D1 football

clean_drive_info()

Clean Drive Information Cleans CFB (D-I) Drive-By-Drive Data to create pts_drive column

penalty_detection()

Penalty Detection Adds penalty columns to Play-by-Play data pulled from the API

add_play_counts()

Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data pulled from the API's raw game data

clean_pbp_dat()

Clean Play-by-Play data Cleans Play-by-Play data pulled from the API's raw game data

clean_drive_dat()

Create new Drive results and id data Cleans Play-by-Play data pulled from the API's raw game data

prep_epa_df_after()

Creates the post-play inputs for the Expected Points model to predict on for each game
